channel.title: Romeo and Juliet Project
channel.description:
In Honors English, we were assigned to do a "creative project" about romeo and juliet, it can be anything as long as we somehow incorporate one of the themes.
I was thinking about making facebooks for all the characters, and filling out fake information+having them interact with each other.
Like Romeo is in a relationship with Juliet and it is complicated Romeo is Dead Paris is dead Lady Montague is dead Juliet is dead
.... you get the point
Like invite all of the characters to an event like "Ball at Capulet's house"
What do you guys think? I really need an A and would value your input

item.title: Romeo and Juliet Project
item.dc:creator: @theUnforgiven theUnforgiven
item.description:
@theUnforgiven wrote:

In Honors English, we were assigned to do a “creative project” about romeo and juliet, it can be anything as long as we somehow incorporate one of the themes.

I was thinking about making facebooks for all the characters, and filling out fake information+having them interact with each other.

Like Romeo is in a relationship with Juliet and it is complicated
Romeo is Dead
Paris is dead
Lady Montague is dead
Juliet is dead

… you get the point

Like invite all of the characters to an event like “Ball at Capulet’s house”

What do you guys think? I really need an A and would value your input

Read full topic
